data.text: Vinye, mègaŋlɔ nye nufiame be o,
elabena woadidi wò agbenɔƒewo ɖe edzi
Lɔlɔ̃ kple nuteƒewɔwɔ megate ɖa le gbɔwò gbeɖe o,
Ekema àkpɔ amenuveve kple ŋkɔ nyui
Ɖo ŋu ɖe Yehowa ŋu kple wò dzi blibo,
ɖo ŋu ɖe eŋu le wò mɔwo katã dzi
Mèganye nunyala le wò ŋutɔ wò ŋkume o,
Esia ahe dɔyɔyɔ vɛ na wò ŋutilã
De bubu Yehowa ŋu kple wò kesinɔnuwo
ekema wò avawo ayɔ agbagba,
Vinye, mègado vlo Yehowa ƒe amehehe o
elabena Yehowa ɖɔa ame siwo wòlɔ̃ la ɖo
Woayra ame si ke ɖe nunya ŋu
elabena nunya xɔ asi wu klosalo
Asixɔxɔ le eŋu wu adzagba
Agbe didi le eƒe ɖusi ƒe asi me,
Eƒe mɔwo nye mɔ siwo dzi vivi le
Enye agbeti na ame siwo xɔ eya amea
Nunyae Yehowa tsɔ ɖo anyigba la ƒe gɔmeɖokpe anyii
Etsɔ eƒe nunya ma gogloƒewoe
Vinye, lé afia nyui tsotso kple sidzedze me ɖe asi,
Woanye agbe na wò
Ekema àlé wò mɔ atsɔ le dedinɔnɔ me
Ne èmlɔ anyi la, màvɔ̃ o,
Mègavɔ̃ ŋɔdzi si ava kpoyi
elabena Yehowa anye wò dzideƒo
Mègagbe nyuiwɔwɔ na ame siwo dze nɛ,
Mègagblɔ na wò aƒelika be,
Mègaɖo vɔ̃ ɖe wò aƒelika,
Mègatsɔ nya ɖe ame aɖeke ŋu dzodzro
Mègabiã ŋu ŋutsu nu sesẽ wɔla
elabena Yehowa nyɔa ŋu ŋutsu nu tovo wɔla
Yehowa ƒe fiƒode le ame vɔ̃ɖiwo
Yehowa ɖua fewu le dadala fewuɖulawo ŋu,
Nunyalawo nyia bubu ƒe dome,
